      • open

        public void open(String registrationId,
                 SSLContext sslContext,
                 com.microsoft.azure.sdk.iot.deps.transport.amqp.SaslHandler saslHandler,
                 boolean useWebSockets)
          throws ProvisioningDeviceConnectionException
        Opens the Amqp connection
        Parameters:
        registrationId - The specified registration id for the connection
        sslContext - The SSLContext that will get used for this connection
        saslHandler - custom handler for sasl logic. May be null if no sasl frames are expected
        useWebSockets - Flag to determine if using WebSockets
        Throws:
        ProvisioningDeviceConnectionException - if connection could not succeed for any reason.

        Parameters:

        callbackContext - Callback context for the response call.
